sentences.en: A grey carpet was removed to reveal the original pine floor.
sentences.cn: 一块灰色的地毯被揭开，露出了原来的松木地板。

sentences.en: an old lady with grey hair
At one point last week shares in the grey market touched 230p.
sentences.cn: 上周，灰市上的股票价格一度高达230便士。

sentences.en: At the horizon the land mass becomes a continuous pale neutral grey.
sentences.cn: 陆地在地平线处变成了一片浅灰。

sentences.en: Do you have these skirts in grey?
Earl Grey, Darjeeling and Jasmine are best-selling traditional teas.
sentences.cn: 伯爵茶、大吉岭茶和茉莉花茶是最畅销的几种传统茶叶。

sentences.en: Going grey is not necessarily synonymous with growing old.
sentences.cn: 头发变白并不一定等于变老了。

sentences.en: He was a tall, lanky man with iron-grey hair.
sentences.cn: 他是个瘦高个子，一头铁灰色头发。

sentences.en: He was a tall, thin man with grey hair.
sentences.cn: 他是个瘦高个，头发灰白。

sentences.en: He was an old man with grey, grizzled hair.
sentences.cn: 他是一位头发花白的老人。

sentences.en: He was wearing a light-grey suit over a shirt.
sentences.cn: 他在衬衫外面套了一件浅灰色西装。

sentences.en: His beard was just beginning to show signs of grey.
sentences.cn: 他的胡子才刚有点泛白。

sentences.en: His grey jersey and trousers were sodden with the rain.
sentences.cn: 他的灰色针织毛衫和长裤全都被雨水淋透了。

sentences.en: I undid the bottom two buttons of my yellow and grey shirt.
sentences.cn: 我解开了自己黄灰相间的衬衫上最下面的两个纽扣。

sentences.en: Nothing would grow in the shadow of the grey wall.
sentences.cn: 灰墙的背阴处什么东西也长不出来。

sentences.en: Staff will be issued with new grey-and-yellow designer uniforms.
sentences.cn: 将会向雇员发放灰黄相间的名牌新制服。

sentences.en: Two thousand grey seal pups are born there every autumn.
sentences.cn: 那里每年秋天有2,000头灰色小海豹出生。

phrases.tran_cn: 伯爵茶（一种红茶）；格雷伯爵（英国贵族头衔）
[口]头脑；智力；脑部和脊椎的灰色神经组织
大灰狼；苍狼（产于欧亚大陆和北美）

trans.tran_cn: 灰色的，头发灰白的，苍白的，昏暗的，沉闷的，单调乏味的，老年人的
trans.tran_en: having the colour of dark clouds, neither black nor white
the colour of dark clouds, neither black nor white
if someone greys, their hair becomes grey
